bioghist.p: Mary Patterson McPherson received her bachelor's and Doctor of Laws degrees from Smith College, her master's from the University of Delaware, and her Ph.D. from Bryn Mawr College. She has taught at the University of Delaware and served as professor and dean at Bryn Mawr before being appointed as president. She served as President of Bryn Mawr College from 1978-1997.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the papers of President Mary Patterson McPherson. There are also some papers from her tenure as Dean of the College. Materials include: incoming and outgoing correspondence (1971-1997); administrative and professional subject files; committee files; speeches; and personal correspondence, photographs, and honorary degrees.
